```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(billboard)
```

```{r}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |> 
  as_tibble()
```

```{r}
x |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  distinct(artist) |> 
  summarize(distinct_artists= n()) |> 
  arrange(desc(distinct_artists))
```
